page.title: 04A LOCAL RESIDENT
page.content: Mrs Lawson is our school granny.She is 80 yrs old and lives in our village. Mrs Lawson,"Why do you like living in the village ?"Because it is very pleasant and I had the chance of a nice bungalow here so I came."Where have you been in your spare time ?"Well I have been to the U.S.A,up the Statue of Liberty and the Empire State Building."What do you grow in your garden?" I like what I call a higgledy piggledy garden.I do not like straight lines.I like a cottage garden.And I love the children at North Cadbury school thats my highlights of Cadbury and I mean that.
